basics.name: Corvey Lee
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Fall, 2026.

work.company: UH Manoa Office of Residental Life
work.summary: Assisting UH Manoa residents navigate academics and dorm life
highlights: Propose and submit funding for educational projects with the purpose of improving students' academic, emotional, and social wellbeing
Utilized problem solving skills to mediate conflicts between residents in order to ensure an inclusive space for all residents
Administrative duties including submitting program proposals, maintenance requests, incident reports, and room transfers

work.summary: Training workers how to properly navigate the food-service industy
highlights: Trained new employees proper food preparation techniques and customer service skills
Assisted in organizing shift scheduling and placement
Handled shipping manifests and the organization and maintenance of the stock room

volunteer.summary: Volunteering to participate in Kailua High School yearly concession stand and emu fundraisers
highlights: Took orders and helped students learn how to work in the food industry
Preparing food and emu preparation for the high school to give back to the community during Thanksgiving

volunteer.summary: Volunteering to take orders and prepare food to be sold at the Kanegusuku Booth of the Okinawan Festival
highlights: Engaged with members of the Okinawan community and learned about the genealogy of Okinawans living in Hawaii

awards.title: Manoa Academic Merit Scholarship
awards.summary: Maximum scholarship awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.6 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: Dean's list
awards.summary: Earned a cumulative GPA above 3.5 for the Spring 2024 semester.
